Title: To Opportunity Point
Description:
Glad that's out of the way. Now my boss can stop breathing down my neck!

I got some repairs to do on my ride, but you should go to Opportunity Point and check it out! I'll even give you a free drink voucher to our fine establishment. 

Go talk to Griz Finglebur and he'll get you sorted.
ObjectivesText: Get a drink at Opportunity Point.
RewardText: Welcome to Opportunity Point! You got a drink ticket, eh? Coming right up!
